title: Add FO-05 to navigation and overview
description:
Add FO-05 to the navigation config and overview page.

Files to modify:
- `nav.config.ts` - Add FO-05 entry after FO-04 with Demo and Info children
- `app/overview/page.tsx` - Add FO-05 card to versions array

For nav.config.ts, add after FO-04:
```typescript
{
  label: 'FO-05',
  href: '/fo-05',
  children: [
    { label: 'Demo', href: '/fo-05' },
    { label: 'Info', href: '/fo-05/info' },
  ],
}
```

For overview page, add to versions array:
```typescript
{
  id: 'FO-05',
  name: 'Full Onboarding (Sentence Fragments)',
  href: '/fo-05',
  tagline: 'Lower friction with sentence starters',
  description: 'Same flow as FO-04 but with sentence fragment inspiration. Prominent text input with optional AI-generated half-finished sentences that help users get started writing.',
  inputType: 'Free text + sentence fragments',
  outputType: 'Iterative swipe selection',
  highlight: 'Sentence starters',
}
```
acceptance_criteria: nav.config.ts contains FO-05 entry; app/overview/page.tsx contains FO-05 card; npm run build succeeds
closed_reason: Added FO-05 to nav.config.ts and app/overview/page.tsx (versions array and comparison table). Build verified.
